 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְדֹּם‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==axe== (√ unknown; compare Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְדֹּם‎</span> ***double hoe***,one side of which could split wood, [[BDB#Vogelst|Vogelst]]<sup>Land writhsch.37</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***adze*** is loan-word according to [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>84</sup>); — suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְדֻמּוֺ‎</span> [[1Sam.13.20|1Sam 13:20]] + [[Judg.9.48|Judg 9:48]] (so probably read for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַקַּרְדֻּמוֺתּ‎</span>, [[BDB#A|A]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangGreek">τ. ἀξίνημ</span>, [[BDB#GFM|GFM]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]); plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְדֻּמִּים‎</span> [[1Sam.13.21|1Sam 13:21]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְדֻּמוֺת‎</span> [[Jer.46.22|Jer 46:22]]; [[Ps.74.5|Ps 74:5]]
